name: Meraki Resort (Adults Only)
description: Highlights • The first boho clubbing resort in the Middle East • Longest private beach on the Red Sea (2.6km) • Boho-inspired rooms and suites • Variety of bars, clubs, buffet and 8 à la carte restaurants (unlimited visits) • Adults Only (16+) To all stylish travelers with their seaside settings, laidback vibe and quirky, personalized preferences, Meraki introduces the first clubbing/boho resort in the Middle East with the biggest beach in the Red Sea; 2.6KM in the heart of Hurghada. The adults- only resort (16+) will capture the bohemian souls into an “all-in” experience, a 4-star resort with a 5-star service. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the resort and in all rooms. Stylish 368 rooms and suites are filled with truly bohemian style, in all kinds of ways. All Rooms come along with a bathroom with shower, a balcony or terrace and all amenities for a perfect holiday such as: Mini-bar, Sat TV, AC hair dryer and bathroom amenities. Various Clubbing themes within the Resort will ensure an all- round experience. With a large variety of Clubs, Pubs and Bars, the bohemian clubbing offers the perfect atmosphere for party seekers. Chill out Sanctuary areas are also available for those seeking for a relaxing day at the beach. The resort includes a total of 13 Bars, Clubs & Cafés: Vibe Club, Pub Fiction, Sports Bar, 4 Beach Bars, 2 Pool Bars, Latitude Bar, Shisha Tent, Beans n’ Cream Café and a 24-hour Lobby Bar. Experience tasteful meals in one of the 9 restaurants. Meraki Resort offers an all-inclusive dining experience including: 1 International Buffet Restaurant and 7 a la Carte Restaurants with Egyptian, Asian, Greek, Burger House, Pizzeria, Noodle and Gourmet Street Food Cuisine. For Seafood lovers, the resort offers the Felucca Seafood restaurant (chargeable). Meraki Resort offers a large private sandy beach with many party spots and sporting activities, including Beach Volleyball, Jungle Gym, Yoga & Pilates, an on-site diving center and much more. 3 pools, a fully equipped gym, and a full services spa & beauty shop (chargeable) will round up your stay. Located in Hurghada Centre and 13km (20 min) to Hurghada International Airport, the resort features a distinctive location. Our all-inclusive concept includes: Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner in Buffets or a la carte Restaurants (unlimited reservations), Snacks from 12:00-17:00, 22:30-01:00, local alcoholic Beverages from 10:00-00:00, Water and Hot Beverages 24/7, Wi-Fi, free entertainment and sports activities, and much more. Some activities/services such as Diving Center, Spa Treatment are extra charge. Please get back to the hotel’s AI Formula for detailed information.

address_obj.address_string: El Dahar - El Cornish Road Down Town, Hurghada 84517 Egypt
